author.description:
Generative Artist with a Master’s in History of Modern Art & Curatorial Studies. Building
AtelierArt.io. HUG 100 Artists to Watch.


Website: pixelsymphony.art

text:
Wlademir Dias Pino, from solida (1957) with the second phase of poem on facing page.

solida = solid
solidão = solitude
so = only
lida = works (third person singular)
sol = sun
saido = gone out
da lido do dia = from the day's labor
